name: kaleidoscope top
notes:
hobbii pattern no. 1006-202-9239



this beautiful [**kaleidoscope top**][1] is not only hypnotizing to look at but also to crochet! itâ€™s made in rainbow glitter in a light and a dark color, creating a beautiful interplay of colors. the top can be crocheted in 8 sizes from xs to 4xl, so you can just get started. now all you need to do is pick your favorite colors.

**sizes:** xs, s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl, 4xl

**skill level:** experienced

**crochet hook:** 4 mm (us size g)

**materials:** stitch markers, sewing needle for weaving in the ends, scissors

**gauge:** 5 rounds = 11 cm

**yarn:** rainbow 8/4 glitter gold in colors
anthracite gold (#010) and silver grey gold (#014)

**how much yarn do you need?**
*xs:* anthracite gold: 2 skeins, silver grey gold: 2 skeins
*s:* anthracite gold: 3 skeins, silver grey gold: 2 skeins
*m, l, xl:* anthracite gold: 3 skeins, silver grey gold: 3 skeins
*2xl, 3xl:* anthracite gold: 4 skeins, silver grey gold: 3 skeins
*4xl:* anthracite gold: 4 skeins, silver grey gold: 4 skeins

**tip:** in case you want to use different colors
it is important to use 2 contrasting colors so
the spinning effect will be visible


  [1]: https://hobbii.com/kaleidoscope-top?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=kaleidoscope-top+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
